answers.answer: you havent missed nothin it's been dead here. Take good care of your self. I was thinking about posting my AA experience, but held back.

Nothing much you missed! I'm glad you're exercising and working. I'm sorry you had a health scare and hope you feel better! Right now I've gotten some snow and i'm so sick of snow! I wish it was spring!!!Kendra

question: Sorry I've been so scarce lately...some CL I am! I had a bad health scare a couple of months ago. Finally got back to work and work is ALL I do!
